title: PLZ! Back Face of the Mountain Active and Ruby Sightstone Passive
body:
That is exactly what I want: THE ACTIVE OF THE  FACE OF THE MOUNTAIN{{item:3309}}  ... I mean if Shurelyas and Twin Shadows {{item:3905}} are back in order to replace actives of {{item:3306}}  and {{item:3312}}   respectly. Why not create a new item with that same pasive of Face of the Mountain? Also the Supp Tanks needs a couple of items to have more optimization, I also really miss the passive of  Ruby Sightstone too...

With the new Active of Solari {{item:3190}}  there's no Shield Active Items... And that feels very weird to me. I mean the chance to be a hero with some champs dissapear...

I want to save my adc of the mischeavous ignite with quick reflexes and be a hero! I really love that sensation! Please RITO put again

I want Something Like this

{{item:3309}} FOTM (Name and Icon could be a completely new one)

Recipe: {{item:3105}}  + {{item:3067}}  + 400g  (Total Cost 2300g)

Stats: 35 Armor, 35 Magic Resist, 300 HP, 10 CDR

Passive UNIQUE: Active ability items' cooldowns are reduced by 20% each.

Active UNIQUE: Grant a shield to yourself and an ally equal to 15% of your maximum health for 4 seconds. After 3 seconds, the shield explodes to Slow nearby enemies by 50% for 2.5 seconds (**90 second cooldown**).

The stats, recipe can be others but the essence of the active and passive is the thing that really matters here. . . If two items come back why not the last one?
